record.dc:title: View from Teachers' Cottage
record.dc:description: The photographer was looking roughly northeast from the porch of the Teachers' Cottage. One may see 1. Home of Squire Maples, 2. County School House Used by Lodge. The schoolhouse mentioned was the first schoolhouse used by Pi Beta Phi in 1912.
